cont.entity_a: The fan is not truly reversible; it must be manually flipped in the window to change airflow direction.
cont.entity_b: The fan does not have a reverse airflow feature.

cont.entity_a: It fits well in standard 28‚Äù windows and is easy to install.
cont.entity_b: Installation can be difficult due to size and weight. The fan requires additional modifications for secure installation.

Power.comm: The fan is powerful and moves a lot of air.

Noise.comm: It is noisy, especially on high settings.

cont.entity_a: The noise level is high even on the low setting, but the airflow is effective.
Durability is inconsistent, with some units failing quickly and others lasting longer.
cont.entity_b: Durability is an issue, with some units failing after short use.

cont.entity_a: Customer service is unhelpful for issues like blown fuses.
The fan is inexpensive and provides good value for the price.

cont.entity_b: The fan is not balanced and may vibrate excessively.
The fan is heavy and requires secure installation.
The fan is effective in cooling large spaces. It is suitable for use as a whole house fan.

cont.entity_a: The fan does not include enough window extenders for all installations.
